metadata.name: Chimera Phoenix Golden Corpus
metadata.description: 50 essential preset types showcasing the plugin's 56 DSP engines across musical applications

presets.name: Classic Guitar Processing
presets.description: Essential guitar chain with overdrive, chorus, and reverb
presets.signal_flow: Input → Overdrive → Chorus → Reverb → Output

presets.name: Vocal Warmth & Presence
presets.description: Warm vocal processing with tube saturation and compression
presets.signal_flow: Input → Tube Preamp → Opto Compressor → Harmonic Exciter → Output

presets.name: Bass Foundation
presets.description: Tight bass processing with compression and subtle saturation
presets.signal_flow: Input → Compressor → Tube Saturation → EQ → Output

presets.name: Punchy Drums
presets.description: Drum processing with transient shaping and parallel compression
presets.signal_flow: Input → Transient Shaper → Compressor → Harmonic Exciter → Output

presets.name: Analog Synth Character
presets.description: Classic analog synth processing with filter and modulation
presets.signal_flow: Input → Ladder Filter → Phaser → Tremolo → Output

presets.name: Modern Electronic Lead
presets.description: Contemporary electronic lead with saturation and modulation
presets.signal_flow: Input → Multiband Saturator → Frequency Shifter → Digital Delay → Output

presets.name: Acoustic Guitar Intimacy
presets.description: Gentle acoustic guitar enhancement with subtle reverb
presets.signal_flow: Input → Harmonic Exciter → Light Chorus → Spring Reverb → Output

presets.name: Heavy Rock Guitar
presets.description: Aggressive rock guitar with distortion and spatial effects
presets.signal_flow: Input → Distortion → Phaser → Gated Reverb → Output

presets.name: Smooth Jazz Warmth
presets.description: Warm, smooth processing for jazz instruments
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vintage EQ → Opto Compressor → Plate Reverb → Output

presets.name: Electronic Dance Energy
presets.description: High-energy electronic processing with modulation
presets.signal_flow: Input → Harmonic Exciter → Resonant Chorus → Digital Delay → Output

presets.name: Pop Vocal Shine
presets.description: Modern pop vocal processing with clarity and presence
presets.signal_flow: Input → Dynamic EQ → Harmonic Exciter → Shimmer Reverb → Output

presets.name: Ambient Soundscape
presets.description: Ethereal ambient processing with spatial enhancement
presets.signal_flow: Input → Shimmer Reverb → Granular Cloud → Stereo Widener → Output

presets.name: Lo-Fi Hip Hop Vibe
presets.description: Vintage lo-fi processing with analog character
presets.signal_flow: Input → Bit Crusher → Tube Preamp → Magnetic Drum Echo → Output

presets.name: Country Guitar Twang
presets.description: Country guitar processing with clean compression and reverb
presets.signal_flow: Input → Compressor → Harmonic Tremolo → Spring Reverb → Output

presets.name: Experimental Texture
presets.description: Creative textural processing with granular synthesis
presets.signal_flow: Input → Granular Cloud → Spectral Freeze → Chaos Generator → Output

presets.name: Glitch Art
presets.description: Digital glitch effects for electronic music
presets.signal_flow: Input → Buffer Repeat → Bit Crusher → Frequency Shifter → Output

presets.name: Psychedelic Swirl
presets.description: Trippy modulation effects for psychedelic sounds
presets.signal_flow: Input → Analog Phaser → Rotary Speaker → Shimmer Reverb → Output

presets.name: Industrial Aggression
presets.description: Harsh industrial processing with metallic textures
presets.signal_flow: Input → Wave Folder → Ring Modulator → Feedback Network → Output

presets.name: Vocal Formant Morph
presets.description: Vocal transformation using formant processing
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vocal Formant → Phased Vocoder → Stereo Imager → Output

presets.name: Clean Mix Bus
presets.description: Transparent mix bus processing for clarity
presets.signal_flow: Input → Parametric EQ → Classic Compressor → Stereo Imager → Output

presets.name: Warm Mix Bus
presets.description: Warm analog-style mix bus processing
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vintage Console EQ → Vintage Opto → Harmonic Exciter → Output

presets.name: Drum Bus Punch
presets.description: Drum bus processing for impact and cohesion
presets.signal_flow: Input → Transient Shaper → Multiband Saturator → Vintage Console EQ → Output

presets.name: Vocal Bus Polish
presets.description: Vocal bus processing for consistency and presence
presets.signal_flow: Input → Dynamic EQ → Vintage Opto → Harmonic Exciter → Output

presets.name: Instrument Bus Glue
presets.description: Instrument bus processing for cohesion
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vintage Console EQ → Classic Compressor → Light Plate Reverb → Output

presets.name: Transparent Master
presets.description: Clean mastering chain for transparency
presets.signal_flow: Input → Parametric EQ → Mastering Limiter → Stereo Imager → Output

presets.name: Warm Master
presets.description: Warm mastering chain with analog character
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vintage Console EQ → Multiband Saturator → Mastering Limiter → Output

presets.name: Loud Master
presets.description: Competitive loudness mastering chain
presets.signal_flow: Input → Dynamic EQ → Harmonic Exciter → Mastering Limiter → Output

presets.name: Vintage Master
presets.description: Vintage-style mastering with tape character
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vintage Console EQ → Vintage Tube → Mastering Limiter → Output

presets.name: Spatial Enhancement
presets.description: Stereo enhancement and spatial processing
presets.signal_flow: Input → Stereo Widener → Mid-Side Processor → Dimension Expander → Output

presets.name: Vintage Delay Suite
presets.description: Classic delay effects in series
presets.signal_flow: Input → Tape Echo → Magnetic Drum Echo → Bucket Brigade → Output

presets.name: Modern Reverb Hall
presets.description: Modern reverb processing for large spaces
presets.signal_flow: Input → Convolution Reverb → Shimmer Reverb → Stereo Widener → Output

presets.name: Rhythmic Echo
presets.description: Rhythmic delay effects with modulation
presets.signal_flow: Input → Digital Delay → Classic Tremolo → Feedback Network → Output

presets.name: Filter Sweep Dance
presets.description: Dance music filter effects with resonance
presets.signal_flow: Input → Ladder Filter → Envelope Filter → Resonant Chorus → Output

presets.name: Vocal Formant Magic
presets.description: Advanced vocal formant processing
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vocal Formant Filter → Formant Filter → Harmonic Exciter → Output

presets.name: Comb Filter Resonance
presets.description: Resonant comb filtering for metallic tones
presets.signal_flow: Input → Comb Resonator → Ring Modulator → Plate Reverb → Output

presets.name: Pitch Harmony Stack
presets.description: Harmonic pitch processing for rich textures
presets.signal_flow: Input → Intelligent Harmonizer → Pitch Shifter → Detune Doubler → Output

presets.name: Modulation Matrix
presets.description: Complex modulation effects in series
presets.signal_flow: Input → Analog Phaser → Rotary Speaker → Harmonic Tremolo → Output

presets.name: Distortion Cascade
presets.description: Multiple distortion stages for aggressive tones
presets.signal_flow: Input → K-Style Overdrive → Muff Fuzz → Wave Folder → Output

presets.name: Saturation Layers
presets.description: Layered saturation for harmonic richness
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vintage Tube → Multiband Saturator → Harmonic Exciter → Output

presets.name: Dynamic Control Suite
presets.description: Complete dynamic range processing
presets.signal_flow: Input → Noise Gate → Transient Shaper → Classic Compressor → Output

presets.name: Vintage Compression
presets.description: Classic compression with vintage character
presets.signal_flow: Input → Vintage Opto → Vintage Tube → Vintage Console EQ → Output

presets.name: Modern Clean
presets.description: Modern transparent processing chain
presets.signal_flow: Input → Dynamic EQ → Mastering Limiter → Stereo Imager → Output

presets.name: Spectral Manipulation
presets.description: Advanced spectral processing effects
presets.signal_flow: Input → Spectral Freeze → Phased Vocoder → Spectral Gate → Output

presets.name: Texture Generator
presets.description: Complex textural processing
presets.signal_flow: Input → Granular Cloud → Chaos Generator → Feedback Network → Output

presets.name: Retro Game Audio

presets.name: Orchestral Space

presets.name: Cinematic Tension
presets.description: Film score tension and atmosphere
presets.signal_flow: Input → Shimmer Reverb → Chaos Generator → Spectral Freeze → Output

presets.name: Creative Sound Design
presets.description: Ultimate creative sound design chain
presets.signal_flow: Input → Granular Cloud → Ring Modulator → Phased Vocoder → Output
presets.target_use: Sound design, experimental music, film/game audio
